page.title: 10HOME LIFE
page.content: The most common number of people in a household is four with almost as many single people (a result of the number of senior citizens ). Although those with five or more per household is relatively common . Most people rise between 6 a.m. and 8 a.m. have toast and/or cereal with liquid refreshment (mostly tea or coffee). Few people have a fried breakfast or nothing at all at this time of the day. In the morning most people watch TV fewer listen to the radio and even fewer read the papers but many people said they did none of these. The largest group of people watch 1-4 hours of TV a day. About half of this number view 5-8 hours with a very small number watching less than 1 or more than 8 hours a day.
